    • Method Detail

      • getArtwork

        public Artwork getArtwork​(int artwork_id)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieve an artwork from database by given artwork's id.
        Parameters:
        artwork_id - The artwork's id that is wanted to be searched.
        Returns:
        Return an artwork by given artwork id, return null if it doesn't exist in database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws sql exception if there is any connection error.

      • getAllArtwork

        public java.util.List<Artwork> getAllArtwork()
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieve all artworks from the database.
        Returns:
        Return a list of artworks.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws sql exception if there is any connection error.

      • updateArtwork

        public int updateArtwork​(Artwork artwork)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Update the artwork information into the database.
        Parameters:
        artwork - The artwork that is wanted to be updated into the database.
        Returns:
        Return any integer except 0 if update successfully, if not it will return 0.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws sql exception if there is any connection error.

      • deleteArtwork

        public int deleteArtwork​(Artwork artwork)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Delete an artwork from the database.
        Parameters:
        artwork - The artwork that is wanted to be removed from the database.
        Returns:
        Return any integer except 0 if delete successfully, if not it will return 0.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws sql exception if there is any connection error.

      • insertArtwork

        public int insertArtwork​(Artwork artwork)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Insert an artwork into the database.
        Parameters:
        artwork - The artwork that is wanted to be inserted into the database.
        Returns:
        Return any integer except 0 if insert successfully, if not it will return 0.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws sql exception if there is any connection error.

      • getSculptureAdditionalPic

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSculptureAdditionalPic​(int sculptureId)
                                                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieve all of a sculpture's additional pictures from the database.
        Parameters:
        sculptureId - Sculpture's id that is wanted to be able to get the additional pictures.
        Returns:
        Return a list of string that contain sculpture additional pictures' url.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws sql exception if there is any connection error.

      • insertSculptureAdditionalPic

        public int insertSculptureAdditionalPic​(int sculptureId,
                                        java.lang.String image_url)
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Insert an additional picture of a sculpture into the database.
        Parameters:
        sculptureId - The sculpture that is wanted to be inserted new picture into the database.
        image_url - The sculpture's image url.
        Returns:
        Return any integer except 0 if insert successfully, if not it will return 0.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws sql exception if there is any connection error.

      • deleteSculptureAdditionalPic

        public int deleteSculptureAdditionalPic​(int sculptureId,
                                        java.lang.String image_url)
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Delete an additional picture of a sculpture from the database.
        Parameters:
        sculptureId - The sculpture from which the user wants to delete a picture from the database.
        image_url - The sculpture's image url that is wanted to be deleted from the database.
        Returns:
        Return any integer except 0 if delete successfully, if not it will return 0.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws sql exception if there is any connection error.

              throws java.sql.SQLException
